issue.title: li.blogtrottr.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://li.blogtrottr.com/click?s=124178&%3Bsz=116x15&%3Bli=99999&%3Bm=a47f15e1f63c88b5a6a1d657b83f51ee&%3Bp=d3f7be25eacb830e096c4731ab36169bbecf83f6&%3Blctg=1167671](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fli.blogtrottr.com%2Fclick%3Fs%3D124178%26amp%253Bsz%3D116x15%26amp%253Bli%3D99999%26amp%253Bm%3Da47f15e1f63c88b5a6a1d657b83f51ee%26amp%253Bp%3Dd3f7be25eacb830e096c4731ab36169bbecf83f6%26amp%253Blctg%3D1167671) ### Comment > Здравствуйте! > Прошу добавить правило: > > `||li.blogtrottr.com^` > > Потому как данная ссылка не ведет никуда кроме рекламных переходов. То есть клик на место обведенное на этом https://postimg.cc/4HvjmhVj скриншоте ведет на вышеупомянутую рекламную ссылку. По сути это рекламный домен. > > Пруфы: https://iplogger.org/ru/url-checker/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fli.blogtrottr.com%2Fclick%3Fs%3D124178%26amp%3Bsz%3D116x15%26amp%3Bli%3D99999%26amp%3Bm%3Da47f15e1f63c88b5a6a1d657b83f51ee%26amp%3Bp%3Dd3f7be25eacb830e096c4731ab36169bbecf83f6%26amp%3Blctg%3D1167671 > > Данная ссылка добавляется в сообщения от Blogtrottr в качестве монетизации. > > HTML образец письма: > https://file.io/CYRWbtt12lAQ > Если не будет работать > https://ufile.io/coa69z75 > > P.S: Так же в письме есть ссылки на подобии https://blogtrottr.com/legal/?lctg=1167671, поэтому было бы не лишним так же добавить правило `$removeparam=lctg` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/bvb0l9cv23ccs4c4wo48w0cggk40w00s6h0zumbftw.jpg?nc=1)

issue.title: GlobalTools.* - Missing objects (AdGuard Tracking Protection filter)

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.50.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?
```
https://www.globaltools.dk/
https://www.globaltools.no/
https://www.globaltools.se/
```

* Example:
`https://www.globaltools.no/verktoy/ror-og-vvs-vaerktoj-8817/inspektions-og-lokalisering-8857/`

### What filters do you have enabled?

* **AdGuard Tracking Protection filter**

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected sites:
```
https://www.globaltools.dk/
https://www.globaltools.no/
https://www.globaltools.se/
```

### Issue:
Missing objects.

### Example:
`https://www.globaltools.no/verktoy/ror-og-vvs-vaerktoj-8817/inspektions-og-lokalisering-8857/`

### Screenshot:
Not needed, as the problem is obvious.

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Tracking Protection filter**

### Problem rule:
`||cdn.clerk.io/clerk.js
`
### Possible fix:
`@@||cdn.clerk.io/clerk.js$domain=globaltools.dk|globaltools.no|globaltools.se`

--

### System info:
* OS/version: Windows 10 Pro 22H2 (x64)
* Browser/version: LibreWolf v115.0.2-2 (x64) [Tracking Protection = Standard]
* Adblock Extension/version: uBlock Origin v1.50.0

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
OK, great! Fix indeed works on my side too. 👍

#### 🍪 Another problem (cookies-related):

Can you confirm that on [this non geo-locked video](https://www.6play.fr/le-10-minutes-p_11541/29102021-le-10-minutes-c_12901661) for example (coming from [this show](https://www.6play.fr/le-10-minutes-p_11541)), you stay perpetually on [this](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/4764956/5b6eae3a-36eb-46a4-b151-5899f7655293) whereas by disabling AdGuard you have [that](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/4764956/ae19f353-85da-4977-9b4b-ae4612c3ef2c) and that after choosing cookies (refusal for example), you have the video which [plays correctly](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/4764956/92360042-ea56-45c5-89c6-04c7cf729f3d)?

labels.name: A: In progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.6play.fr/m6](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.6play.fr%2Fm6) ### Comment > Sur le premier screen, la page d'accueil de M6 replay qui ne s'affiche pas entièrement et donc impossible d'aller dans les différentes catégories de replay quand la protection adguard est activée via l'extension safari. Sur la deuxième image, j'ai désactivé la protection et la page d'affiche normalement où je peux cliquer sur les différentes catégories de replay qui me sont proposées. De plus je ne peux pas lancer aucun replay et donc aucune vidéo ne tourne quand la protection est activée. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Yes, I have the same issue.
It seems that this rule:
```adblock
||sdk.privacy-center.org/*/loader.js$script,redirect=didomi-loader,domain=6play.fr
```
fixes it, at least on my end.
Could you please check it?

comment.body:
uBo has already added set-cookie, trusted-set-cookie and 4 storage scriptlets.

However, it also has the logic that trusted versions won't start from just any list and someone has to manually copy solutions to the uAssets file or expand the range of allowed variants in the global set-cookie.

comment.body:
> You can block a video completely with a rule: `sabah.com.tr###lazyloadRandomVideosContainer`
> 
> Don't think it's an annoyance, the sound doesn't automatically turn on and it doesn't block the site content.

I get it, it's not that annoying yeah but it's annoying if you're in a 3rd world country with limited mobile internet plan. It's literally playing a 720p+ stream while I just wanted to read an article that nothing to do with that stream. In Turkey we don't have unlimited no tether mobile plans like USA or other 1st world countries. The annoying part is that's EXTREMELY unnecessary waste of quota for average Turkish mobile plan user.

# Creating the pull request > Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\ > If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\ > It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\ > Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it ## Prerequisites ### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms - [x] This is not an ad/bug report; - [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project; - [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes; - [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure. ## What problem does the pull request fix? ### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section - [x] Missed ads or ad leftovers; - [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly; - [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website; - [ ] Missed analytics or tracker; - [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc; - [x] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc; - [ ] Filters maintenance. ## What issue is being fixed? ### Enter the issue address 1. `https://webextension.org/blog/2022/09/11/review-of-the-goggle-play-protect-app.html` 2. `https://webextension.org/listing/ocr.html` ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. `webextension.org##.adb` 2. `webextension.org###adb` , `webextension.org###cookie`

По сути это рекламный домен. > > Пруфы: https://iplogger.org/ru/url-checker/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fli.blogtrottr.com%2Fclick%3Fs%3D124178%26amp%3Bsz%3D116x15%26amp%3Bli%3D99999%26amp%3Bm%3Da47f15e1f63c88b5a6a1d657b83f51ee%26amp%3Bp%3Dd3f7be25eacb830e096c4731ab36169bbecf83f6%26amp%3Blctg%3D1167671 > > Данная ссылка добавляется в сообщения от Blogtrottr в качестве монетизации. > > HTML образец письма: > https://file.io/CYRWbtt12lAQ > Если не будет работать > https://ufile.io/coa69z75 > > P.S: Так же в письме есть ссылки на подобии https://blogtrottr.com/legal/?lctg=1167671, поэтому было бы не лишним так же добавить правило `$removeparam=lctg` ### Screenshots

```adblock

$script,third-party,denyallow=bunnycdn.ru|bootstrapcdn.com|cdn.ampproject.org|cloudflare.com|cdn.staticfile.org|disqus.com|disquscdn.com|dmca.com|ebacdn.com|facebook.net|fastlylb.net|fbcdn.net|fluidplayer.com|fontawesome.com|github.io|google.com|googleapis.com|googletagmanager.com|gstatic.com|jquery.com|jsdelivr.net|jwpcdn.com|jwplatform.com|polyfill.io|recaptcha.net|shrink.pe|twitter.com|ulogin.ru|unpkg.com|userapi.com|vidazoo.com|vk.com|yastatic.net|ytimg.com|zencdn.net|youtube.com|cackle.me|googleoptimize.com|vuukle.com|chatango.com|twimg.com|google-analytics.com|hcaptcha.com|raincaptcha.com|media-imdb.com|blogger.com|hwcdn.net|instagram.com|wp.com|fastcomments.com,_____,domain=9anime.to
```

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: reddit.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.57

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox, Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

reddit.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Annoyance to register email. If you have no email registered to your account you will see this banner on every page, you can dismiss it but it will show up again on your next session.

It can be blocked using `reddit.com##div > div.kEQVd8aneM1tVkcIKUyDT`.

I see there was an issue about this that has been closed https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/119302#issue-1242261606.

I have tested a completely fresh account in Tails and I can confirm the class is not unique to each account https://streamable.com/z6iums.

![](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/ea1f09c14f16d1d1745ed739166e027c37c99d1c0f85145f753fbdc8f0048b66/68747470733a2f2f7265706f7274732d696d672e616467756172642e636f6d2f4e55474b6e77312e706e67)

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
